message: Hey I had the same error, not sure if you got around to fixing it yet. What fixed it for me is I went into Input Map in the Project Settings and bound left mouse click to a input named "click" which is defined in the cursor script. Hope that helped
message_html: Hey I had the same error, not sure if you got around to fixing it yet. What fixed it for me is I went into Input Map in the Project Settings and bound left mouse click to a input named “click” which is defined in the cursor script. Hope that helped
